mapper.select: SELECT GL.ID AS GALLERY_ID, GL.MOMENT_ID AS MOMENT_ID, GL.PARTICIPANT_ID AS PARTICIPANT_ID , UI.NAME AS PARTICIPANT_NAME, GL.FILE_REALNAME AS FILE_REALNAME , GL.FILE_SETTINGNAME AS FILE_SETTINGNAME , GL.ROOT AS ROOT, GL.UPLOAD_DATE AS UPLOAD_DATE FROM GALLERY GL LEFT JOIN MM_PARTICIPANT MT ON GL.PARTICIPANT_ID = MT.ID LEFT JOIN GR_MATCH GM ON MT.MEMBER_ID = GM.ID LEFT JOIN US_INFORMATION UI ON GM.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID WHERE GL.MOMENT_ID = #{moment_id} ORDER BY GL.UPLOAD_DATE DESC
SELECT DISTINCT(MM.NAME) AS MOMENT_NAME FROM GALLERY GL LEFT JOIN MOMENT MM ON GL.MOMENT_ID = MM.ID WHERE GL.MOMENT_ID = #{moment_id}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM GALLERY

SELECT GM.ID AS MEMBER_ID FROM GR_MATCH GM LEFT JOIN TBL_GROUP GR ON GR.ID = GM.GROUP_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_USER US ON US.ID = GM.USER_ID WHERE US.ID = #{user_id} AND GR.ID = #{group_id} AND GM.ID NOT IN (SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM GR_MEMBER_QUIT)

SELECT ID AS PARTICIPANT_ID FROM MM_PARTICIPANT MT WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_id} AND MOMENT_ID = #{moment_id} AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MM_QUIT WHERE QITER_ID = MT.ID) = 0 AND MT.MOMENT_ID NOT IN (SELECT MOMENT_ID FROM MM_NONACTIVE)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GALLERY(ID, MOMENT_ID, PARTICIPANT_ID, FILE_REALNAME, FILE_SETTINGNAME, ROOT, UPLOAD_DATE) VALUES('GL0' || GALLERYSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{moment_id}, #{participant_id}, #{file_realname}, #{file_settingname}, #{root}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT GL.ID AS GALLERY_ID, GL.MOMENT_ID AS MOMENT_ID, GL.PARTICIPANT_ID AS PARTICIPANT_ID , UI.NAME AS PARTICIPANT_NAME, GL.FILE_REALNAME AS FILE_REALNAME , GL.FILE_SETTINGNAME AS FILE_SETTINGNAME , GL.ROOT AS ROOT , TO_CHAR(GL.UPLOAD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPLOAD_DATE FROM GALLERY GL LEFT JOIN MM_PARTICIPANT MT ON GL.PARTICIPANT_ID = MT.ID LEFT JOIN GR_MATCH GM ON MT.MEMBER_ID = GM.ID LEFT JOIN US_INFORMATION UI ON GM.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID WHERE GL.ID = #{gallery_id} ORDER BY GL.UPLOAD_DATE DESC

SELECT GC.ID AS COMMENT_ID, GC.WRITER_ID AS WRITER_ID , GC.CONTENTS AS CONTENTS , TO_CHAR(GC.WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS WRITE_DATE , UI.NAME AS WRITER_NAME , (CASE WHEN GC.WRITER_ID = #{member_id} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS MY_COUNT FROM GL_COMMENT GC LEFT JOIN GR_MATCH GM ON GC.WRITER_ID = GM.ID LEFT JOIN US_INFORMATION UI ON GM.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID WHERE GC.GALLERY_ID = #{gallery_id} ORDER BY GC.WRITE_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GL_COMMENT(ID, GALLERY_ID, WRITER_ID, CONTENTS, WRITE_DATE) VALUES('GC0' || GLCOMMENTSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{gallery_id}, #{member_id}, #{contents}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM MM_PARTICIPANT MT LEFT JOIN GR_MATCH GM ON GM.ID = MT.MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_USER US ON US.ID = GM.USER_ID WHERE MT.MOMENT_ID = #{moment_id} AND US.ID = #{user_id} AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MM_QUIT WHERE QITER_ID = MT.ID) = 0 AND MT.MOMENT_ID NOT IN (SELECT MOMENT_ID FROM MM_NONACTIVE)
